title: A register, in a form considered appropriate by the Commissioner, shall be maintained of all transactions relating to grant or utilization of DRCs arising out of slum rehab projects
clause_text: A register, in a form considered appropriate by the Commissioner, shall be maintained of all transactions relating to grant or utilization of DRCs arising out of slum rehab projects.
section: Additional Regulations for the grant of TDR to the Developers/Co- operative Housing Societies/NGOs in respect of slum rehabilitation scheme vide DCR 33(10) and DCR 33(11)

source_pdf.text_snippet: A register, in a form considered appropriate by the Commissioner, shall be maintained of all transactions relating to grant or utilization of DRCs arising out of slum rehab projects.
